name: Static Sock
description:
In Static Sock, you are a sock.

Use the power of static electricity against an invading flock of birds.


Use the carpet to charge electricity - but watch out - friction will slow your movement down.

Hit  multiple birds with the same attack to gain extra points.

- Controls -

Arrow keys - Move + Charge

Z - Jump

X - Attack

Made using Love2D for LÖVE Jam 2019.

My high-score is 360, if anyone can beat that ;)

- Downloads -

Windows version works on Windows.

Universal version can be run using LÖVE version 11.2 on Windows, Mac and Linux.
